comments.body: ~I modified the code in `isSorted` because we still need to sort output rows even if `plan` has a `Sort` node. For example, most sort nodes sort rows by some columns of all output columns, but we always need to sort them by  all output columns. This change leads to many diffs of the files in `sql/core/src/test/resources/sql-tests/results`.~
The other code parts in this trait are just copied from `SQLQueryTestSuite`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +55,59 @@          | _: DescribeColumnCommand
          | _: DescribeRelation
          | _: DescribeColumn => true
      case PhysicalOperation(_, _, Sort(_, true, _)) => true
      case _ => plan.children.iterator.exists(isSorted)
